mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, '' as visit_id, a.label, a.parentId FROM ( SELECT bd.CODE id, bd.NAME label, ifnull( bd.up_dept_code, '-2' ) parentId FROM base_dept bd WHERE bd.is_valid = '1' AND bd.CODE != 'B30' AND bd.type_code = #{deptType} AND bd.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ) a UNION ALL SELECT bd.`code` id, '' as visit_id, bd.`name` label, '-2' parentId FROM base_dept bd WHERE bd.CODE in ( SELECT IFNULL( up_dept_code,#{code})
FROM base_dept inbd WHERE inbd.is_valid = '1' AND inbd.type_code =#{deptType} AND inbd.CODE != 'B30' AND inbd.hosp_code = #{hospCode} ) AND bd.up_dept_code IS NULL

SELECT '无' visitNo, iv.id, iv.NAME, scd.`name` AS gender, concat( age, ' ', scd2.`name` ) age, iv.in_no AS inNo, iv.bed_name AS bedName, iv.zz_doctor_name AS zzDoctorName, iv.in_time AS inTime, iv.in_disease_name AS inDiseaseName, iv.out_time AS outTime FROM inpt_visit iv LEFT JOIN sys_code_detail scd ON iv.gender_code = scd.`value` AND scd.c_code = 'XB' LEFT JOIN sys_code_detail scd2 ON iv.age_unit_code = scd2.`value` AND scd2.c_code = 'NLDW' WHERE iv.in_no = #{inVisitNo} UNION ALL SELECT visit_no AS visitNo, ov.id, ov.`name`, scd.`name` AS gender, concat( age, ' ', scd2.`name` ) age, '无' inNo, '无' bedName, doctor_name AS zzDoctorName, visit_time AS inTime, bd.`name` AS inDiseaseName, null outTime FROM outpt_visit ov LEFT JOIN sys_code_detail scd ON ov.gender_code = scd.`value` AND scd.c_code = 'XB' LEFT JOIN sys_code_detail scd2 ON ov.age_unit_code = scd2.`value` AND scd2.c_code = 'NLDW' LEFT JOIN outpt_diagnose od ON ov.id = od.visit_id and od.is_main='1' LEFT JOIN base_disease bd on od.disease_id = bd.id WHERE is_visit = '1' AND ov.visit_no = #{inVisitNo}

SELECT mr.advice_id AS adviceId, mr.visit_id AS visitId, mr.in_no AS inNo, item_id AS itemId, item_name AS itemName, result, apply_no as applyNo, result_detail AS resultDetail, reference_value AS referenceValue, result_unit AS resultUnit, crte_time AS crteTime, mr.is_positive as isPositive FROM medic_result mr WHERE mr.in_no = #{inNo} AND ( mr.advice_id = #{adviceId} or mr.advice_id = #{zhId} ) ORDER BY crte_time ASC

SELECT a.apply_no AS applyNo, a.in_no AS inNo, a.order_no AS orderNo, a.dept_id AS deptId, a.dept_name AS deptName, a.doctor_name AS doctorName, a.apply_time AS applyTime, a.rporter AS reporter, a.remark, a.content, a.coll_blood_name AS collBloodName, a.coll_blood_time AS collBloodTime, mr.crte_time as reportTime, mr.crte_name as crteName, mr.checker as checker, mr.check_time as checkTime, mr.reviewer as reviewer, mr.audit_time as auditTime FROM medic_apply a left join medic_result mr on a.opd_id = mr.advice_id and a.hosp_code = mr.hosp_code where a.in_no = #{inNo} and a.type_code= '4' and a.apply_no = #{applyNo} LIMIT 1

SELECT ma.apply_no AS applyNo, ma.in_no AS inNo, ma.order_no AS orderNo, ma.dept_name AS deptName, ma.doctor_name AS submittingPhysician, ma.apply_time AS applyTime, ma.result_id AS resultId, mr.result, ma.content, mr.reporte_text AS diagnosis, mr.check_part AS checkPart, mr.crte_name AS reportPhysician, mr.crte_time AS reportTime, mr.crte_name AS auditor, ifnull(bd.NAME,iv.in_disease_name) AS clinicalDiagnosis FROM medic_apply ma inner JOIN medic_result mr ON ma.in_no = mr.in_no AND ma.apply_no = mr.apply_no LEFT JOIN outpt_diagnose od ON od.hosp_code = #{hospCode} AND ma.visit_id = od.visit_id AND od.is_main = '1' LEFT JOIN base_disease bd ON od.disease_id = bd.id LEFT JOIN inpt_visit iv on iv.in_no = ma.in_no WHERE ma.type_code = '5' AND ma.in_no = #{inNo} AND ma.hosp_code = #{hospCode} AND ma.apply_no = #{applyNo} LIMIT 1
select id from base_dept where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and id = #{deptId} and (type_code = '1' or type_code = '2');
SELECT id, hosp_code AS hospCode, `NAME` as hospName, `CODE` As parameterCode FROM sys_parameter sp where sp.`code` = 'YLJGBM' and sp.hosp_code = #{hospCode} limit 1
select code from base_dept where up_dept_code is null

SELECT mr.advice_id AS adviceId, mr.visit_id AS visitId, mr.in_no AS inNo, item_id AS itemId, item_name AS itemName, result, apply_no as applyNo, result_detail AS resultDetail, reference_value AS referenceValue, result_unit AS resultUnit, DATE_FORMAT(crte_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS crteTime, mr.is_positive as isPositive, (select item_name from inpt_advice_detail where id = mr.advice_id and hosp_code =#{hospCode}) as adviceName, (select dept_name as deptName from medic_apply where visit_id =#{visitId} and apply_no =mr.apply_no and hosp_code =#{hospCode} limit 1) as deptName FROM medic_result mr WHERE mr.visit_id=#{visitId} and hosp_code =#{hospCode} ORDER BY crte_time ASC
